events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding the wrong item.
Assigning the case to a customer service agent specialized in refund and return requests.
Hello, thank you for contacting customer support. I am here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the item you received so we can process your refund?
My order number is 987654321 and I have attached photos showing the incorrect item delivered instead of what I ordered.
We apologize for the error. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this matter.
The refund has been processed successfully and you will receive a return label by email shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and that your refund process went smoothly.
Yes, I received the return label and the refund appeared in my account. Thank you very much for your assistance.
Closing the case now as the refund was completed and customer has confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
Sending a satisfaction survey to gather feedback on your support experience with the refund process.
